When I really ask myself

where on Earth my Kingdom is,

poisoning my perspective instantly,

I am urged to answer precisely with dots and lines.

It was a safe route when we were in the seeding period; swallowing the world with our eyes.

How it melts and seeps in from skin to internal organs.

A circle: of reachable things and unexpected things that come together to make.

Day and night, whose difference is only an amount of blue.

Dwarf city falls down slowly.

I open my eyes gradually,

But I can't see the contour

An unreliable Dream Horse.

Asking where on Earth my Kingdom is.

I'm standing fearfully inside of the dove's heart which engulfs the wind,

And is penetrated by puffiness.

Fulfilled as an air balloon

and as opened as a shell

it overflows after all.

As long as we face my Kingdom from this world,

and smell the flowers and moist oceans under the clouds

or find the shade where the birds sing

or the voice of hippopotami

Stay away from the tough work of describing the deep insides of a woman

and increase invisible bodies which can do more than shatter.

and as opened as a shell

and as opened as a shell
